cves.description: A vulnerability in the web-based management interface of affected products could allow an unauthenticated remote attacker to cause a denial of service.  Successful exploitation could allow an attacker to crash the system, preventing it from rebooting without manual intervention and disrupting network operations.

affected.product: HPE Aruba Networking 100 Series Cellular Bridge

cves.description: A vulnerability in the command line interface of affected devices could allow an authenticated remote attacker to conduct a command injection attack. Successful exploitation could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the underlying operating system.

affected.product: HPE Aruba Networking 100 Series Cellular Bridge

cves.description: The comment editing template (dzz/comment/template/edit_form.htm) in DzzOffice 2.3.x lacks adequate security escaping for user-controllable data in multiple contexts, including HTML and JavaScript strings. This allows low-privilege attackers to construct comment content or request parameters and execute arbitrary JavaScript code when the victim opens the editing pop-up.
